aiopslab_2025.title: AIOpsLab: Agent Evaluation Platform
takeaways: Adopt four-level incident workflow: detection, localization, root cause, mitigation.
Keep telemetry ingestion interchangeable to support synthetic and real cloud traces.
Expose evaluation contracts early so agents reason with scoring metrics in mind.

mabc_emnlp2024.title: mABC: Multi-Agent Blockchain Collaboration
takeaways: Use decentralized voting to synthesize multiple agent hypotheses.
Reward specialists with recent success rate to dampen hallucinated answers.
Log ballot provenance for post-hoc auditing and continuous learning.

flow_of_action_www2025.title: Flow-of-Action: SOP Enhanced Multi-Agent RCA
takeaways: Represent RCA as explicit standard operating procedures (SOP) to reduce invalid tool calls.
Embed guard rails that prune telemetry before reasoning to fight overload.
Decompose tasks into actionable phases with success criteria for each.

chain_of_event_fse24.title: Chain-of-Event: Interpretable RCA
takeaways: Construct event graphs linking services, metrics, and operations.
Score candidate chains with latency, error ratio, and topology consistency.
Surface interpretable path summaries in final explanations.

tamo_tool_assisted_rca.title: TAMO: Tool-Assisted LLM Agent for RCA
takeaways: Expose specialized analyzers as callable tools with schema validation.
Fuse metric/log/trace findings via shared episodic memory.
Implement action budget to avoid redundant tool invocations.

exploring_llm_agents_fse2024.title: Exploring LLM-based Agents for RCA
takeaways: Alternate between thought and tool actions, capturing rationales for each step.
Ground decisions in retrieval hits drawn from historical incidents.
Measure factual accuracy before finalizing component choice.

flash_workflow_agent.title: FLASH: Workflow Automation Agent
takeaways: Persist failure trajectories and reuse them as future hints.
Gate transitions with status checks to avoid cascading errors.
Provide a fallback plan when critical telemetry is missing.

rcaeval_benchmark.title: RCAEval Benchmark
takeaways: Validate RCA quality across multiple microservice archetypes.
Track component accuracy alongside reasoning coherence metrics.
Use consistent dataset adaptors to switch between Online Boutique, Sock Shop, and Train Ticket.
